co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.block

Class BlockRedstoneWireBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.block.Block
      • co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.block.BlockWireBase
        • co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.block.BlockRedstoneWireBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMeasureTransferer, IRedstoneWire, BlockDirectionsMod, net.minecraft.block.ITileEntityProvider

    public class BlockRedstoneWireBase
extends BlockWireBase
implements BlockDirectionsMod, IRedstoneWire
    Base for mod redstone wire. Not the same as vanilla's system but is more flexible, albeit laggier in bigger redstone contraptions.
    Author:
    Niadel
